entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Hopewell
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:52 AM AST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.5°C

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then clearing. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 2.
